page.title: 02AN INTRODUCTION TO HAXEY
page.content: Hood game held up at Tower Hill.It all started when Lady Mowbray lost her hood(the wind blew it)and all the farmers chased after it. The school in Haxey is quite new.It is down The Nooking and has been open for four years,children come at the age of four and leave at the age eleven.It is called Haxey Church Of England Primary School. The Youth Training Scheme is for people getting a job.It is run by the Church and is at the old school. The Nature Reserve is down The Nooking opposite the school.It used to be an old railway line but now it is a nature reserve. There are quite a lot of sport facilities like-football,tennis,bowls,cricket and a B.M.X. track.They are all down in the local park.
